actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that all future security benefit increases shall be disregarded in determining the eligibility of an individual for medical assistance or the status or extent of coverage of an individual under the medicaid program.

summary.text: Provides, under title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act, that all future social security benefit increases shall be disregarded in determining the eligibility of an individual for medical assistance or the status or extent of coverage of an individual under the Medicaid program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that all future security benefit increases shall be disregarded in determining the eligibility of an individual for medical assistance or the status or extent of coverage of an individual under the medicaid program.
